textList.string: Hey there! I'm a helpful NPC character. I'm here to give you hints and useful advice.
Don't worry. You know you can trust me because I've got this sweet beard.
Collect all these yellow things to activate the door!
Saving... Don't turn off your computer!
Save Successful
Load Successful
You've collected a Health Cube. Collect several of these to increase your health.
You've collected enough Health Cubes to increase your health bar.
Collect more to increase your health even more.
You've collected a Warp Cube. Collect more to activate this sector's warp network.
This door isn't powered. Collect more power cubes.
Bwahahahaha. Puny pajama man! I will crush you!
Ack! I'm stuck... You'll pay for this!
No wait! Don't touch that! Stay away from my vulnerable backside!
Ouch! That hurt!
Noooooo! I've been defeated by a dude in green pajamas!
Haha! Fool! Your weapons will never penetrate my invincible armor!
Prepare to die!!!
Nooo... brothers... avenge me!
Ack! You've found my weak spot!
Oh yeah? Let's see how you deal with my heat seeking missiles?
Muahaha. There's a sweet item in the next room. But you'll never live to see it!
Feel the icy wrath of... ICE SNAKE!
Gah! My ice armor is cracking!
Fool! You've thawed out my guns! Now I'll get you!
Ouch! You'll never defeat me!
Nooo... I've failed!
Bwahahaha. You can't hurt me! My ice armor is far too strong for blasters!
You've made it pretty far, but your quest ends here! The third dimension will be ours!
What the? A loose block?!?
Curses! You've broken through my armor!
Ah... that's better! Now where were we?
You're a persistent little bugger aren't you...
Nooooooooo...
Oh whatever. Your DOOM awaits you in the Engine sector!
You unlocked the Rocket Boots!
While equipped, you'll be able to perform an extra jump while in mid-air.
Walk to an item station and use the Left or Right mouse button to equip them.
You unlocked the Blaster Gun!
Once equipped, you'll be able to use it to destroy enemies.
Walk to an item station and use the Left or Right mouse button to equip it.
You unlocked the Wall Jump Boots!
While equipped, you'll be able to jump off walls indefinitely.
Walk to an item station and use the Left or Right mouse button to equip them.
You unlocked the Gravity Boots!
While equipped, you'll be able to walk on certain walls!
Walk to an item station and use the Left or Right mouse button to equip them.
You unlocked the Laser Cannon!
The Laser Cannon has a much longer range than the Blaster, and can be used to activate special switches.
Walk to an item station and use the Left or Right mouse button to equip them.
You unlocked the Thruster Pack!
Equip and use the Thruster Pack to launch yourself horizonatlly at extreme speeds.
Walk to an item station and use the Left or Right mouse button to equip them.
You unlocked the Missile Launcher!
Missiles have explosive power. Use them to destroy certain blocks as well as enemy armor.
Walk to an item station and use the Left or Right mouse button to equip them.
You got the Wall Jump Module!
Now you can perform wall jumps without taking up an inventory slot!
You got the Gravity Module!
Now you can walk on Gravity Strips without taking up an inventory slot!
You got the Advanced Jump Module!
Now you can jump higher without using an inventory slot!
You unlocked the Spin Hook!
Use it to grapple special targets and rotate your orientation.
Walk to an item station and use the Left or Right mouse button to equip it.
You unlocked the Jet Pack!
Use it to fly high into the air. Jet pack fuel will regenerate while on the ground.
Walk to an item station and use the Left or Right mouse button to equip it.
You unlocked the Phase Belt!
Use it to transform into raw energy and warp through entire rooms!
Walk to an item station and use the Left or Right mouse button to equip it.
You got the Yellow Access Codes!
Now you can access Yellow Switches without taking up an inventory slot.
You got the Red Access Codes!
Now you can access Red Switches without taking up an inventory slot.
You got the Blue Access Codes!
Now you can access Blue Switches without taking up an inventory slot.
Press Space Bar to begin!
Use the 'A' and 'D' keys to run, and the 'W' key to jump!
To begin your adventure, walk up to a load station and hit the 'E' key.
Move the mouse to look around and get a better view of your environment.
Hey Vex! I'm a hologram of a helpful old man with a totally sweet beard!
I'll be your guide as you explore the station. Let's start with the basics...
By now you've probably figured out that you can use the 'A' and 'D' keys to run.
You can also use the 'W' key to jump, and the 'E' key to interact with an object.
If you can interact with an object, a red 'E' will appear when you stand next to it.
Try to use that transport station over there. The one that's flashing blue.
The whole station is experiencing a massive power loss.
If you run into an object without power, you won't be able to use it.
However, you can power up the station by collecting yellow power cubes.
Each cube you collect returns partial power to the current room.
Collect enough of them and everything should start working again.
Transport stations will launch you from room to room.
They'll be your primary means of getting around.
If the station is unpowered, it'll be colored dark gray. Find power cubes to activate it.
If the station is flashing blue, that means you haven't yet explored that way yet.
If a station is powered, but has already been explored, it'll be green.
Hey! Check that out. There's a transport station on the wall!
I know it sounds strange, but to access it, you'll need to be on the wall too.
Don't forget you can use the mouse to look around and get a better view of things.
Hey... is that a bottomless pit? Eh... you're a tough guy. You'll be fine.
You won't be able to get very far just running and jumping.
To explore new areas of the station, you'll need to get some equipment.
Gold colored doors indicate Upgrade Stations. These are super important.
This Upgrade Station gives you the ability to equip the Rocket Boots.
To use an Upgrade Station, just walk up to it and hit 'E'.
Once you have the appropriate upgrades, you can use Item Stations to equip stuff.
To equip an item, stand next to the station and hit either the Left or Right mouse button.
Once equipped, you can use the Left and Right Mouse Buttons to use your items.
Certain items, such as the Rocket Boots are special. These are Jump Items.
Jump Items enhance your suit's natural jumping ability.
Because of this, you can use them either with a mouse button, or with the 'W' key.
It also means you can use the mouse buttons for basic jumping as well.
Watch out, Vex. There are several monsters in this room!
Without some sort of weapon, there's not much you can do but avoid them.
Gah... these critters have been chewing on the power cables.
If you find some way to destroy them you'll get additional power cubes.
You should come back here after you've found a weapon!
You can only use an Item Station if you've collected the appropriate upgrade.
If you can't use a station, it will be colored Red.
But if the station is green, you can use a Mouse button to equip an item.
This station stores a special Red power cube.
Red Power Cubes enhance your suit's shielding capabilities.
If you collect 5 Red Cubes, you'll increase your health meter.
Watch out for those spikes! They look pretty painful.
Also, this room is pretty large. You might need to zoom out to get a better look.
Use the mouse wheel to zoom out the camera so you can find the power cubes.
I've got a bad feeling about this, Vex.
You should check out this Save Station before you continue on to the next room.
These will save your progress so that you can continue your adventure later.
I'm impressed you've made it this far.
But your efforts are in vain! I've already begun my journey to the third dimension!
Your puny two dimensional form has no hope of stopping me now!
Guards! Destroy him!
Impossible! How did you do that?
Grrrrr! I will not be denied. The third dimension is MINE!
Noooooo... What have you done?!?
Fool! You've destabilized the dimensional rift.
Hahahaha...
I may be defeated... but you'll never make it out here alive! Hahahahaha...
Well, well, well. Look who we have here.
You may have defeated Armortron...
You may have defeated the Armortron brothers...
But now you face the combined might of the Armortron COUSINS!!!
Yearg!!!
We've all been destroyed!?! Inconceivable!
I can't believe Armortron Prime let you defeat her.
Lets see how you handle the Armortron brothers?!?
Yearg!!!
Nooooo... Cousins... avenge me!
You'll never break through my laser-proof armor!
Prepare to be destroyed!
Ack!
Curses! My armor!
You'll pay for that!
Nooooo! I've been defeated!
Hahahaha... you'll never escape me!
Hahahaha. Your journey ends here!
Come and get me!
Grrr! I'll get you!
All guns, open fire!
Nooo. I've failed.
Testing...
The Central Processing Unit is protected by a tight security system.
All three colored key codes are required to enter.
You'll find an upgrade to use yellow key codes in the Rocket Launch Tube.
You'll find the Launch Tube through the Hangar Bay.
You can find red and blue access codes inside the command cube.
If you bring them back to this room one at a time, you can unlock the stations below.
Then you can come back for the codes whenever you want.
You'll need to move these cargo containers out of the way to proceed.
Look for different ways to enter this room.
Once you've moved all three containers, you should be able to continue.
Vex. This is a warp station. You can use it for fast travel around the sector.
Each sector's warp network is powered by blue power cubes.
Blue cubes can be found in special power stations hidden throughout the station.
You'll need to oriented the right way to use these stations.
If you're stuck, maybe try approaching the problem from a different direction.
